NAME: Blizzard
AUTHOR: FlapJack
DESCRIPTION:
Player information and latest Blizzard game patch notes in chat.

Games supported:
Overwatch - Stats, patch notes
Diablo3 - patch notes
Hearthstone - patch notes
Heroes of the Storm - patch notes
Starcraft2 - patch notes
World of Warcraft - patch notes

Dependencies:
BeautifulSoup4 :: https://www.crummy.com/software/BeautifulSoup/bs4/doc/
pypandoc :: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pypandoc
Pandoc :: http://pandoc.org/
INSTALL_MSG: Thanks for installing FlapJack's Blizzard utilities cog. BeautifulSoup4, pypandoc, and pandoc must be installed to use the patch notes features of this cog. Pandoc is not installed automatically by the downloader cog. Find your install instructions at http://pandoc.org/installing.html.
